attributes.action: Give Pete Wild a statue in Oldham
attributes.background: Oldham Athletic former manager Pete wild. He’s one of our own

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

This would be the responsibility of your local council, who have their own e-petition system. You may wish to start a petition here: https://committees.oldham.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
